name: Pulumi
help: Pulumi is controlled primarily using the command line interface (CLI). It works in conjunction with the Pulumi service to deploy changes to your cloud apps and infrastructure. It keeps a history of who updated what in your team and when. This CLI has been designed for great inner loop productivity, in addition to continuous integration and delivery scenarios.

tasks.help: Cancel a stacks currently running update, if any

properties.name: Stack
properties.help: The name of the stack to operate on. Defaults to the current stack

tasks.help: Show a preview of updates to a stacks resources

properties.name: Config
properties.help: Config to use during the preview

commonTaskProperties.name: Color
commonTaskProperties.help: Colorize output. Choices are: always, never, raw, auto (default is auto)

commonTaskProperties.name: Cwd
commonTaskProperties.help: Run pulumi as if it had been started in another directory

commonTaskProperties.name: DisableIntegrityChecking
commonTaskProperties.help: Disable integrity checking of checkpoint files

commonTaskProperties.name: Emoji
commonTaskProperties.help: Enable emojis in the output (default is true)

commonTaskProperties.name: LogFlow
commonTaskProperties.help: Flow log settings to child processes (like plugins)

commonTaskProperties.name: LogToStderr
commonTaskProperties.help: Log to stderr instead of to files

commonTaskProperties.name: NonInteractive
commonTaskProperties.help: Disable interactive mode for all commands

commonTaskProperties.name: Profiling
commonTaskProperties.help: Emit CPU and memory profiles and an execution trace to '[filename].[pid].{cpu,mem,trace}', respectively

commonTaskProperties.name: Tracing
commonTaskProperties.help: Emit tracing to the specified endpoint. Use the file: scheme to write tracing data to a local file

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Enable verbose logging (e.g., v=3); anything >3 is very verbose

yes.name: Yes
yes.help: Skip confirmation prompts, and proceed anyway

stack.name: ShowIds
stack.help: Display each resource's provider-assigned unique ID

stack.name: ShowSecrets
stack.help: Display stack outputs which are marked as secret in plaintext

stack.name: ShowUrns
stack.help: Display each resource's Pulumi-assigned globally unique URN

stack.name: Stack
stack.help: The name of the stack to operate on. Defaults to the current stack
